title: The requirements of water supply for various occupancies shall be as given in Table No
clause_text: The requirements of water supply for various occupancies shall be as given in Table No.12-A and Table No.12-B or as specified by the Authority from time to time. * - The value in parenthesis is for stations where bathing facilities are not provided.
section: 12.5 WATER SUPPLY, DRAINAGE AND SANITARY REQUIREMENTS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The requirements of water supply for various occupancies shall be as given in Table No.12-A and Table No.12-B or as specified by the Authority from time to time.
